text:
Good job on the recording session.
It went well.
Producer, I figured out what's making me excited.

Oh, really!?
Is it because of the costume after all?

Yes-
You see, with a mask, you can hide your face.

So, I thought, maybe I could pull off some pranks
without getting caught, and that got me excited.

...Is that really a good idea...?
Plus, with that mask, it's obvious it's you, Mamimi.

Oh... So, the doodles on my business card,
were they from Mamimi after all!?

The business card with the heart doodles... When I handed
it to the other party earlier, time seemed to freeze for a moment...

Haha... Well, that's good to know.
Impact is important in sales, you know.
